entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Montmagny
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
